editionStmt.p: The initial version of this file was created from data kindly provided by the Ethiopic Manuscript Imaging Project directed by Steve Delamarter.

publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens und Eritreas: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / Beta maṣāḥǝft

licence.p: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0.

msContents.summary: F: Excerpt of Chants called Mäwaś‘ǝt chants, መዋሥዕት። AṢZ 529–604. F-103v: Chants called Mə‘raf, ምዕራፍ፡. Me‘erāf I and II; AṢZ 103–246, including the Praises of Mary, arranged for the days of the week, with musical notation (pp. 164ff.). Varia. Ff. ii r(ecto), top of col. 1: Instructons about the chants to be performed on various feast days. Middle of col 1: Asmat prayer for knowledge. Bottom of col 1 and col 2: Prayers written by ወልድ ቂርቆስ. F. ii v(erso): chant from the Deggua, poorly preserved, with musical notation. F. iii r(ecto)-iv r(ecto): Excerpt of Mazmur chant, with muscial notation. Notes. P. 199: note of ownership mentions ወልድ ቂርቆስ. The spine strap for the book is a sheet discarded from another book. It contains one of the Miracles of Mary about Saint Däqsǝyos. The miracle mentions "Our Queen, ወለተ ጊዮርጊስ", i.e., Empress Zewditu.

origin.origDate: 1881-1971, life of Mercie Hazen Wolde Qirqos; early-20th century,

revisionDesc.change: Created XML record from EMIP Collection Metadata.xsls
